Job Description: Job Description   - Expertise in developing applications using Ofbiz framework (Very important) and FTL - Free Marker Template  - Should have very good working knowledge on RDBMS , SQL  - Very good knowledge on Object oriented programming concepts  - Java certification will be an added advantage  - He/She should have worked on atleast 3 large development projects  - Good knowledge of Agile software development methodology  - Working Knowledge on source control application (e.g. SVN )
